title: Scenes 3, 4 and 5, from Suit Shopping:  An Engraved Narrative
marks: Signature, Date and Edition LRC below image, in pencil: [Andrew Raftery 2002]
description: 3 images on one sheet, with folds between images; Scene 3 illustrates woman looking at ties in a display case, assisted by a salesman; Scene 4 illustrates man standing on platform at right, looking at woman, having his pants marked by a tailor, with 2 other men at left; Scene 5 illustrates man seated in dressing room, wearing underwear, socks and shirt, with pants on floor
